Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{2: 'Archive Terminal', 3: 'School Archive — 17513-2/10'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: '...Finally, everyone has left.'}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: 'Your vital signs indicate that you are exhausted. Would you like a warm glass of red wine?'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "That won't be necessary... Any news from the city?"}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: 'There were three new explosions in the city. Totalitarians and liberals engaged in more fighting during the council...'}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: '...Vital signs indicate that your blood pressure is rising.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Why has it become like this...'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'How could human aspirations be so easily distorted by greed and animalistic behavior?'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "Or... did I overestimate humanity's virtues?"}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: 'Due to your physical condition, I have laid out blood pressure medicine and an automatic syringe here just in case.'}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: 'Although it is against your will, I have also placed a warm glass of red wine with sleeping pills in it by the table.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Machines... are absent of animalistic instincts and the desire to fight. It only ever has its eyes set on results...'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'If only there was some way to combine human consciousness with machine behavior...'}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: 'Is something wrong? You are talking to yourself.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "...It's nothing. Bring me my terminal."}
{2: 'Service Mechanoid', 3: 'Understood.'}
{2: 'Archive Terminal', 3: 'School Archive — 17514-1/10'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "You know the two factions can't keep fighting forever..."}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: '...Is there really no other way to resolve this peacefully?'}
{2: 'Director', 3: 'That is why, after negotiation, both factions have unanimously decided to give you the key to the cryogenic chamber.'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "Once we've all entered the cryogenic chamber, only you will be able to initiate the protocol."}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: '...Will they respect whatever result the mechanoids reach? Or have they been working on something in secret like before?'}
{2: 'Director', 3: "...There's no way of knowing."}
